generated_body: In the article titled "Why Wendy's Is One of the Few Fast-Food Chains with Baked Potatoes," the user may expect a detailed exploration of Wendy's unique menu offerings, particularly the inclusion of baked potatoes, which distinguishes it from other fast-food chains. Additionally, it may discuss the nutritional aspects of baked potatoes and how they fit into Wendy's overall brand strategy, appealing to consumers seeking more wholesome fast-food alternatives.
